numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that sports organizations are more accepting of players of color.
2. I wonder why baseball has the lowest percent of players of color.
3. I love seeing that people of color have an opportunity to have careers in sports.
4. I wish that people of color had more diverse people to work with beyond their team.
5. A more diverse environment is a more comfortable environment.
6. The lack of diversity beyond sports teams results in more insensitive behaviors toward players of color.
7. The headline is: Diversity Beyond The Court and Field.
